Description: Using algorithms to extract relevant information from unstructured text sources such as emails or documents.
Determining the sentiment and urgency of user feedback to prioritize requirements.
Organizing extracted data into predefined categories for better clarity and management.
Using historical data to predict the effort required for new features or tasks.
Crafting concise summaries of large text documents to improve communication within the team.
Analyzing retrospective feedback to identify common themes and areas for improvement.
